long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Makes particular websites less cluttered by removing extraneous content, like read-next or watch-next recommendations. It focuses primarily on Youtube, The Guardian, TED, Aeon and several other sites.

+ simplifies Youtube for better focus
+ enables you to easily remove distracting elements yourself
+ enables you to stop gifs
+ enables you to highlight list items
+ enables you to switch articles to simplified "reader-mode"
+ makes ads on DuckDuckGo and Ecosia more distinguishable
+ redirects Facebook homepage to Events page (or any other page) so you cannot see the timeline
+ and more

It does not track you in any way.
The functionalities are highly customisable.
Best served with your favourite ad-blocker.
